products.name: Old Fashioned Rolled Oats
products.labels: Sin gluten,Kosher,Sin OMG,en:Kosher-parve,Proyecto no OGM,en:100% Whole Grain
products.facts: ["Made from whole grain oats, providing essential nutrients and fiber.","Typically packaged in recyclable materials, promoting eco-friendliness.","Non-GMO and often certified organic, ensuring quality and sustainability.","Low in sugar and high in protein, making it a healthy breakfast option."]

products.name: White Cheddar Popcorn
products.facts: ["White Cheddar Popcorn is typically made from whole grain popcorn kernels, which are a good source of fiber.","Many brands use natural white cheddar cheese powder, which is derived from real cheese, enhancing flavor without artificial ingredients.","The production of popcorn generally has a lower environmental impact compared to other snack foods, as it requires less water and land.","Quality white cheddar popcorn often contains no trans fats and is gluten-free, making it a healthier snack option."]

products.name: Sparkling Orange
products.labels: No gluten, Vegetarian, Kosher, No GMOs, No preservatives, Vegan, en:vegan-action
products.facts: ["Made with real orange juice for authentic flavor.","Contains no artificial preservatives, ensuring natural quality.","Packaged in recyclable materials to reduce environmental impact.","Produced using sustainable practices to minimize ecological footprint."]

products.name: Original Gourmet Popping Corn
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Snacks, Cereals and potatoes, Seeds, Cereals and their products, Cereal grains, Corn, Popcorn
products.facts: ["Made from high-quality, non-GMO popcorn kernels.","Packaged in recyclable materials to reduce environmental impact.","Gluten-free and contains no artificial preservatives.","Sourced from sustainable farming practices to promote ecological balance."]

products.name: Simply Granola
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Breakfasts, Cereals and potatoes, Cereals and their products, Breakfast cereals
products.facts: ["Simply Granola is made with whole grain oats, nuts, and honey, providing a wholesome breakfast option.","The packaging is designed to be recyclable, promoting environmental sustainability.","Simply Granola contains no artificial flavors or preservatives, ensuring high-quality ingredients.","The product is made in a facility that follows strict quality control measures to maintain freshness and safety."]

products.name: Hippro Vanille
products.facts: ["Hippro Vanille is made from 100% natural vanilla beans.","The production process is eco-friendly, utilizing sustainable farming practices.","It is free from artificial flavors and preservatives, ensuring high quality.","Hippro Vanille supports fair trade practices, benefiting local farmers."]

products.name: Peanut 100%
products.labels: Fabriqué en France, Nutriscore, Nutriscore A
products.facts: ["Made from 100% roasted peanuts with no additives or preservatives.","Packaged in recyclable materials to reduce environmental impact.","Rich in protein and healthy fats, promoting a balanced diet.","Sourced from sustainable farms that prioritize eco-friendly practices."]

products.name: Gervais  le petit suisse
products.facts: ["Made from high-quality, natural ingredients without artificial additives.","Packaged in eco-friendly materials to reduce environmental impact.","Produced using traditional methods that prioritize sustainability.","Certified for its commitment to quality and ecological responsibility."]

products.name: Digestives The Original Twin Pack
products.categories: Snacks, Sweet snacks, Biscuits and cakes, Biscuits, Wheatmeal biscuits
products.facts: ["Digestives are made with wholemeal flour, providing a source of fiber.","The packaging is designed to be recyclable, promoting eco-friendliness.","They contain no artificial colors or flavors, ensuring high quality and natural taste.","The biscuits are often enjoyed with tea, making them a popular choice for afternoon snacks."]

products.name: Tomato ketchup
products.facts: ["Tomato ketchup is primarily made from tomatoes, vinegar, sugar, and various spices and flavorings.","The tomatoes used in ketchup are often sourced from sustainable farms that practice crop rotation and reduced pesticide use.","Many brands of tomato ketchup are now packaged in recyclable materials to minimize environmental impact.","Quality ketchup typically contains a high percentage of tomatoes, with some premium brands using 100% organic ingredients."]
